name: New Super Mario World
overview: New Super Mario World for SNES has new graphics inspired by New Super Mario Bros for the Nintendo DS, new music tracks inspired by many games on many different systems, a whole new overworld map and some new levels! Some of the game physics have been altered as well. The latest feature is the use of the SA-1 to improve performance. You’ll have a lot of fun with this one! Give it a try. Note: Works only with a headered rom. Also, the community is welcome to use this project as a base as long as proper credit is given.
